home.title: Cincinnati
home.blurb: Following 4 years in NYC, and 1 in Dayton, OH, I am now in Cincinnati. I wish I were closer to hiking areas to see a bit more nature, but maybe that'll be for the next moveâ€¦!

book.title: Billy Summers
book.blurb: Always happy to dive into a King book! I haven't read much of this one yet but enjoying it so far!

game.title: A Plague Tale: Innocence
game.blurb: The sequel recently came out so it's as good a time as any to explore the first game, made by a French team, and set in France during the 14th century.

show.title: Trailer Park Boys
show.blurb: This is a fun, if dark-humoured, mockumentary show that's been great to watch during lunch breaks. I had never watched any of it but knew of a couple of memes, and now I get it. Bubbles is the best part of the show!

music.title: So Much (for) Stardust
music.blurb: While I was never a superfan, I started really listening to FOB's music after their peak of success while I was in high school. Now I can just enjoy it, and their latest album is excellent. Don't miss out!

sports.title: Running
sports.blurb: I started running back in September 2022, and I am now training for my first race in May, which is a 10K. I will sweat. I might swear. But I will go through with this.
